headline: Kimco Realty (KIM) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Kimco Realty (KIM) has been drawing attention after a solid run over the month and past 3 months, which is prompting investors to reassess the real estate investment trust’s income profile and valuation. See our latest analysis for Kimco Realty. Kimco Realty’s recent momentum, including a 30 day share price return of 11.72% and a year to date share price return of 17.40%, sits alongside a 5 year total shareholder return of 53.41%. This suggests investors have been rewarding the REIT over time...
